data.actual_result: Discord is sluggish, animations are slow, loads are slow. It does perform like normal when the developer-tab is open.
data.expected_result: Discord should not be sluggish and perform like with the previous electron version
data.short_description: On Electron 3.x, client is very slow at everything without hardware acceleration
data.steps_to_repro: - Open Discord - Turn hardware acceleration off - Restart discord
